experience.description: Designed and implemented solutions across many of TrueLayers products and platforms such as virtual wallets integrated into the UK's Faster Payments scheme, Integrated into the Australian CDR to allow aggregation of account data of consented end-users, implementation of a native payments SDK to simplify client on-boarding, internal developer tools for Open-telemetry, Logging, MTLS & JWT signing & encryption.
